activeTasks.title: Blofin: 10-iteration optimization loop with multi-timeframe data
activeTasks.details: Building 1h/4h candles, iterative backtest->tune->ML cycle x10, find profitable strategies

lastTaskCompleted.title: 8888 dashboard fully operational with live data tracker
lastTaskCompleted.summary: Fixed 3 bugs: wrong data source, missing metrics merge, win_rate format. Added lightweight live tracker showing real-time tick flow (updates 3s, green/red status indicator). 8780 deprecated.

recentlyCompleted.title: Fixed: Claude-aware rate limiting (1000 RPM)
recentlyCompleted.summary: Added ClaudeRateLimiter to llm_client.py tracking requests per 1-min sliding window. Exponential backoff at 950 RPM threshold. Prevents 429 errors from aggressive optimization loops.

recentlyCompleted.title: Blofin trading pipeline fully operational with real data
